en: We had to write off the debt.

en: A child on your back may guide you across a ford.

en: Make the best of one's lot with fatal resignation.

en: Tighten the lid so that it doesn't go bad.

en: Some eggs weren't rotten, but the rest of them were.

en: Bad milk tastes sour.

en: His father allows him $10 a week as spending money.

en: His father allows him 2000 yen a week.

en: Compared to his father, he is shallow.

en: Compared to his father, he lacks insight.

en: He is the image of his father.

en: He looks just like his father.

en: Compared with his father he is lacking in depth.

en: He managed the company while his father was ill.

zh: 我爸六十岁就要退休了。

en: My father is arriving at the station at five.
zh: 我爸五点到车站。

en: My father is in his fifties.
zh: 我爸五十多岁。

en: Father has 500 volumes.
zh: 爸爸有五百本藏书。

en: My father achieved that and more in four words, which made quoting Shakespeare as effective as any business adviser could wish.
zh: 我爸只用四个字就做到了，甚至效果更好，他引用的莎士比亚名言比任何商业顾问的建议都管用。

en: My father died at the age of forty-nine.
zh: 我爸四十九岁那年去世了。

en: My father is 48, but he looks young for his age.
zh: 我爸四十八岁，但他看着比实际年龄年轻。

en: My father was completely bald by the time he was forty.
zh: 我爸四十岁的时候就全秃了。

en: My father passed away two years ago.
zh: 我爸两年前过世了。

en: Father will be back in a few days.
zh: 爸爸过几天就回来。

en: My father went to sea at fifteen.
zh: 我爸十五岁就出海了。

en: His father had asked the question the year he was fourteen.
zh: 他十四岁那年，他爸爸问了这个问题。

en: Father used to say that time is money.
zh: 爸爸以前常说，时间就是金钱。

en: My father is busy getting ready for his trip.
zh: 我爸正忙着准备旅行呢。

en: My father is usually at home on Sundays.
zh: 我爸周日通常都在家。

en: My father believed that anyone who could not make a living in Japan was lazy.
zh: 我爸觉得，在日本要是没法糊口，那肯定是因为太懒。

en: By the time he retires, my father will have worked for almost thirty years.
zh: 等我爸退休的时候，他就已经工作快三十年了。

en: By the time my father retires, he will have worked for almost thirty years.
zh: 等我爸退休的时候，他就已经干了快三十年了。

en: My father used to say that time is money.
zh: 我爸以前总说时间就是金钱。

en: Father bought me a bicycle.
zh: 爸爸给我买了一辆自行车。

en: My father bought me a bicycle.
zh: 我爸给我买了一辆自行车。

en: My father is proud of me being tall and handsome.
zh: 我爸为我长得又高又帅感到很自豪。

en: My father is proud of my being handsome.
zh: 我爸为我长得帅感到很自豪。

en: My father was, I think, a little drunk then.
zh: 我觉得我爸那时候有点喝多了。

en: My father, who is now working in America, wrote us a letter last week.
zh: 我爸现在在美国工作，他上周给我们写了一封信。

en: My father works for the company as an engineer.
zh: 我爸在那家公司当工程师。

en: My father does not like the heat of summer.
zh: 我爸不喜欢夏天的酷热。

en: Father often tells me to keep things clean.
zh: 爸爸经常嘱咐我要保持整洁。

en: My father has gone out to buy postcard.
zh: 我爸出门买明信片去了。

en: My father's condition seems to improve one moment, but the next moment he sinks again.
zh: 我爸的病情看着好了一会儿，紧接着就又恶化了。

en: It was then that my fathers reproof had come home to me.
zh: 就在那时，我才真正领会到我爸对我的责备。

en: My father's hair has become streaked with gray.
zh: 我爸已经开始长白头发了。

en: The office where my father works is near the station.
zh: 我爸工作的办公室在车站附近。
